pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows7 SP1/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Pentium4 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB or higher
  • Storage: 1.5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750M 512 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
